page.title: 07Holbrook Manor School.
page.content: 9 The school is privately run for boys who have been sent there by their local Education Authority. Boys come from as far north as{Durham and from{London}in the south. Altogether there are 23 boys, ranging in age from 7 years to 14 years.There are 4 teachers including the Headteacher, and four house-parents who look after the boys during out of school time on a rota system with the teaching staff. The children sleep in dormitories, six to a room.They get up at 7 o'clock and prepare for breakfast. School begins at 9 o'clock and the children are split into 4 classes.They learn{Maths, English, Geography, {History and Science. After school they have organised clubs .They watch television and go to bed at 9 o'clock.
